title: Design of Process Equipment - Selected topics
description:
Design of Process Equipment - Selected topics - Kanti K. Mahajan (1979).pdf

ISBN 091445806x

The Design of Process Equipment, such as shell-and-tube heat exchangers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks, requires a familiarity with a variety of sources of design data and procedures. The purpose of this book is to consolidate the scattered literature and present the material in simplified form so that it can be easily applied to design problems. Typical examples have been included to illustrate the application of the relationships and procedures presented in the text. Therefore, the designer should find this book to be a convenient and useful reference. 

The Design of Process Equipment contains 80 illustrations and tables
